Perfect or most suitable.
Happy and cheerful.
A sour, yellow fruit.

A large body of salt water that covers most of the Earth's surface.

Fast; happening in a short time.

Bright and strong (of colors or memories).

The time of life when someone is young.

To accept or act in accordance with.

To capture or seize, especially after a chase.
A series of thoughts, images, and sensations occurring in a person's mind during sleep.
The joint between the upper and lower parts of the arm.
The visible part of a fire.

Speed in doing something, often too quickly.

Forming an essential foundation or starting point.

Not approximated in any way; precise.
